headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy Production
summary: Change Foods raised capital to scale up its precision-fermentation platform for vegan dairy alternatives.

headline: Modern Synthesis Raises $4.1M to Scale Microbial Textile Platform
summary: Modern Synthesis secured funding to expand its microbial textile platform, aiming to replace traditional leather and textiles.

headline: Solar Foods Plans Production Expansion for Solein Protein
summary: Solar Foods announced plans to increase production capacity for its Solein protein, produced via gas fermentation.

headline: Algiknit Partners to Develop Seaweed-Based Yarns for Apparel
summary: Algiknit is partnering with clothing companies to develop yarns made from seaweed, a sustainable alternative to synthetic fabrics.

headline: Formo Announces Partnership for Cellular Agriculture Dairy Production
summary: Formo is collaborating with a major food company to accelerate the development and commercialization of cell-based dairy products.

headline: MycoWorks Announces New Reishi Material Applications
summary: MycoWorks unveiled new applications for its Reishi mushroom-based material, including footwear and automotive interiors.

headline: The EVERY Company Expands Availability of Animal-Free Egg Protein
summary: The EVERY Company increased distribution of its animal-free egg protein, produced through precision fermentation.

headline: Natural Fiber Welding Secures Funding for Sustainable Material Expansion
summary: Natural Fiber Welding obtained funds to scale up its technology for creating sustainable materials from natural fibers.

headline: Zero Acre Farms Announces New Cultured Oil Production Facility
summary: Zero Acre Farms revealed plans for a new facility dedicated to producing its cultured oil, an alternative to vegetable oils.

headline: Biomason Bio-Cement Receives New Construction Certifications
summary: Biomason's bio-cement received certifications, paving the way for wider adoption in the construction industry.
